column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ambiance is dark
column2: and the place is somewhat small
column3: so they get packed quickly. If you want a quick lunch during the day
column4: I suggest going on the early side
column5: 11 or 11:30. They have a big communal table in the middle and a couple bars that offer quicker seating. If you come during the busy time
column6: expect to wait at least 30 minutes.
